organisation_title: Herbarium of Université de Montpellier 2, Institut de Botanique
organisation_description: The herbarium is estimated at about 4 million samples distributed in 15,000 packets. The quantity and quality is one of the largest French collections of dried plants.

organisation_datasets.dataset_title: Herbarium specimens of Université de Montpellier 2, Institut de Botanique (MPU))
